title: Upgraded to a larger 4k monitor and my minimap icons, chat window and mouse icon have all shrunk.
body: As the title said, I upgraded from a 23' 1080p monitor to a larger 4k monitor and most things look fine, but the mouse, minimap icons and chat window are all tiny. I've tried messing with the in-game HUD settings as well as the scaling in the config file and that didn't seem to do anything (perhaps I did this wrong?). Any advice here would be appreciated.

replies.body: We're still a bit away from fully supporting 4K at this point, but it does seem like the latest patch made things a bit better! Adjusting things for 4K support is a bit above these poro's heads, so I'd recommend reaching out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they have any more tricks up their sleeve for getting this working better!
